text: I think go should give certain apis to
control memory
for certain use cases right goal runtime
does a lot of assumptions for us and for
the memory safety and it gives us
guarantees and it's really nice with the
garbage collection what not but
sometimes you really want to reduce
their allocations and there are certain
ways to do that but it would be really
nice to have some granular control on
certain memory parts so that you can
optimize your program for your hotpad
because as far as we see with the GoPro
programs it's mostly about All Occasions
and the GC pressure I know there are
some improvements recently like uh
actually there are some knobs that you
can turn and adjust your garbage
collection on top of that there's this
proposal about the arena support but
still it would be nice to have more
control
[Music]
